card.name: Bamfurlong Beetroot
card.text: Unique. Awakened Plant. 2 strikes. Detainment against hero companies. -3 prowess against vegetarian companies. As a creature it may be keyed to Arthedain, Cardonlan, Rhudaur, or The Shire. As permanent-event, all Awakened Plant attacks receive +1 strike.

card.name: Celery Slayer
card.text: Awakened Plant. Slayer. 2 attacks (of 1 strike each) against the same character. Attacker chooses defending character. The defender may eat a vegetable to cancel 1 of these attacks (and to scare Celery Slayer away).

attr.value: awakened plant. slayer. 2 attacks (of 1 strike each) against the same character. attacker chooses defending character. the defender may eat a vegetable to cancel 1 of these attacks (and to scare celery slayer away).

card.name: Cucumber-lieutenant
card.text: Awakened Plant. 1 strike. If played on a company that has already faced an Awakened Plant attack this turn, Cucumber-lieutenant receives +4 prowess.If played on a company that has already faced Spud-lieutenant this turn and the hazard player is vegetarian he receives 1 Cool Play Point that cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Fell Fowl
card.text: Unique. Animal. May be played as a hazard creature (with 1 strike) or as a short-event. If played as a short-event, play any hazard card from your discard pile (counting against the hazard limit) that gives Cool Play Points.

attr.value: unique. animal. may be played as a hazard creature (with 1 strike) or as a short-event. if played as a short-event, play any hazard card from your discard pile (counting against the hazard limit) that gives cool play points.

card.name: Gangrene Pepper
card.text: Awakened Plant. Undead. 2 strikes. All body checks resulting from successful strikes are modified by an additional +1.

card.name: Rain-pickles
card.text: Awakened Plant. 3 strikes. May also be played at a [B] that has 2 [w] or 1 [c] in its site path if you have got a jar of pickles on the table.

card.name: Rutabaga of the B.-wight
card.text: Awakened Plant. Undead. 1 strike. After the attack, each character wounded by Rutabaga of the B.-wight makes a CC modified by -2. May also be played at [R] with an undead aa.

card.name: Shoe Tree
card.text: Shoe Tree comes into play with up to 2 shoe counters on it. Use your shoes as counters.All Awakened Plant attacks receive +1 prowess for each shoe counter on this card. After an Awakened Plant attack remove 1 shoe counter from this card. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Spud-lieutenant
card.text: Awakened Plant. 1 strike. If played on a company that has already faced an Awakened Plant attack this turn, Spud-lieutenant receives +3 prowess.Cucumber-lieutenant receives an additional +3 prowess if played on a company that has already faced Spud-lieutenant this turn.
